product_name: Stainless Steel Microporous 3 Quart Colander Professional Strainer with Heavy Duty Handle and Self Draining Ideal for Pasta Vegetables & Fruits Dishwasher Safe
description:
【Top Products】 We strive to only provide products that exceed your expectations, and always make you most satisfied. This is why our kitchen filters are made of first-class stainless steel, do not rust, and will never affect the taste of your food!   【Durable Stainless Steel】 All stainless steel heavy-duty structure, maximum durability at an unbeatable price. The sturdy handle and durable mesh make this filter set a must-have. It will not rust even in the dishwasher! It does not contain BPA, so plastic chemicals will not be immersed in your food.   【Sturdy Base】 The footed design facilitates quick and easy drainage for faster preparation, cleaner rinsing and more efficient cooking. It is an excellent alternative to handheld spider filters.   【Excellent Design】The fully perforated mesh filter and foot design provide excellent drainage performance and minimize losses. The mesh is strong and will not warp, stretch or get stuck even under heavy food. In addition, it is 100% dishwasher-safe and easy to clean.   【Drain Everything】This steel filter set is perfect for washing, rinsing or draining pasta, rice, quinoa, grains, fruits, vegetables, berries, canned food, beans, pasta, hamburgers, tuna, cooked Meat and eggs.
